song.title: Flash of the Rom
song.info:
ST (3 channel YM2149)
Winner at the STNICCC 2015 music competition
The long awaited Atari-Event is over. Many of the old sceners contributed their art, as well as new artists their products. These are the votes for the Chiptune category for the 25th Anniversary of the ST News International Coding Conference in Gouda/Netherlands. We go through in opposite direction of the voting: The last one you listen to is the first place!
